com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.interpreter

Class AbstractIterativeMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.core.solver.AbstractMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator
      • com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.interpreter.AbstractIterativeMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultiIndexQuantifierEliminator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BruteForceMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator, SampleMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator

    public abstract class AbstractIterativeMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator
extends AbstractMultiIndexQuantifierEliminator
    An abstract class for quantifier eliminators using a simple (total or sampled) iteration over the domain of the eliminated variables.

    The current assignment to the eliminated variables is kept in the Context's global object with key ASSIGNMENTS_GLOBAL_OBJECTS_KEY, which can be extended with extendAssignments(Map, Context). This same assignment is also used by top rewriters in implementations of AbstractInterpreter to simplify variables.

    Author:
    braz
